notes: Soap and More is a Canadian supplier offering cosmetic-grade Inulin Powder sourced from chicory root. Their inulin is a natural, environmentally-friendly prebiotic specifically designed for microbiome care in skincare formulations. The chicory-derived inulin selectively feeds beneficial skin bacteria, supporting microbiome balance and skin health. Suitable for natural and clean beauty formulations. Canadian quality standards ensure consistent product quality. Easy to incorporate into various formulation types including creams, serums, and masks.
